metadata.description: Probably a prospectus for Goiffon and Vincent's "Mémoire artificielle des principes relatifs a la fidelle représentation des animaux, tant en peinture qu'en sculpture."
Newberry's copy imperfect: lacking all after title page?
"Trois volumes, petit in-folio, dont un de 23 planches gravées. Prix trente-six livres en feuilles."
metadata.notes: Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
